column4: I have a question.  I have ubuntu on this partition. I have WINXP on my other partition. Is it possible to access my files on the other partition?
work's great and use the config utility in system tools to configure it
I used the program, Are you able to open .exe files in ubuntu?
you need wine to use windows applications in linux
wine is a compatabilty lay for linux that allow windows application to run under linux
what exactly do you wish to do with windows?
I am trying to open a program in ubuntu that use in windows all the time.
they make no linux version of the program, only .exe.
most likely you will have to install wine ( sudo apt-get install wine )
also check this out http://www.linuxalt.com/ it's a site with equivalent's to windows applications
